releases.release: Pre-release to test GitHub pages functionality.

component-info.title: DocBook publication toolchain
component-info.summary: The `xtpxlib-xdoc` component contains an XProc (1.0) based DocBook publication toolchain. * Starting point is some narrative written in DocBook, with the following extensions: * Parameter references that are expanded (for dates, times, phrases, names, etc.) * Special elements that trigger conversions. These conversions can insert generated DocBook into the source. For instance complex tables, documentation, etc. * The resulting "pure" DocBook can be used for further processing. * The component contains specific pipelines for converting the DocBook to PDF and XHTML
